member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: A private class for the key value pair used by the GetConfigurationSettings method

member.summary: Get the configuration information from appSettings in the Web.config, skipping the serilog settings

member.summary: Get the logged in user identify name which is returned in the format of DOMAIN\\USERNAME

member.summary: Get user properties from Active Directory

member.summary: Get the Site XDCredentials settings from the App_Data/CtxSites.xml file, set the Credentials and Authenticate.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.XDPing(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs an XDPing to make sure the Delivery Controller or Cloud Connector is in a healthy state

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.GetCurrentSessions(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets all current sessions for a user

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.GetSessionExtraInformation(System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.Runspace,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns an Expando object with the RegistrationState of a machine. We do this in the same Runspace to (a) make it more efficient, (b) loading the "Citrix.Broker.Admin.V2" SnapIn once, and (c) leverage the previous XDAuth call.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.IncludeDeliveryGroup(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Check if the Delivery Group should be included by assessing the IncludeDeliveryGroups and ExcludeDeliveryGroups elements from the Site Name node of the App_Data/CtxSites.xml file. (1) If IncludeDeliveryGroups is empty, all Delivery Groups will be included by default. (2) If ExcludeDeliveryGroups is empty, no Delivery Groups will be excluded by default unless IncludeDeliveryGroups is set. (3) ExcludeDeliveryGroups will override IncludeDeliveryGroups (4) IncludeDeliveryGroup and ExcludeDeliveryGroups can contain a partial name of a Delivery Group. So if you have a standard naming convention, you can include all Delivery Groups that contain a string pattern in their name.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.LogofforDisconnectSessions(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Logs off or diconnects all sepecified sessions.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.RestartMachines(System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Restarts all sepecified machines.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.HideSessions(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Hides all sepecified sessions.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.GetAllSites(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets all site data from the App_Data/CtxSites.xml file.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.GetAppSettings
member.summary: This method returns an array of JSON objects read from the appSettings element of the web.config file.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.GetSiteList
member.summary: This method returns an array of JSON objects read from the App_Data\CtxSites.xml file. Each Site contains 4 elements. (1) FriendlyName - the name in the drop down list that Users will associate with. (2) Name - the real Site name, or just a short name used to identify the site. (3) DeliveryControllers - a comma separated list of Delivery Controllers for that site. (4) Port â€“ the port number the Delivery Controllers listen on. An XDPing is run against them to ensure they are healthy. (5) Default - the default value is False. Set this to True if you have multiple Sites but want 1 Site to be the default selected when users access the tool. If only 1 Site is added to the XML file, it will automatically default to this Site so there is no need to set a value for Default.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.GetLoggedOnUserName
member.summary: This method returns the logged on username in the format of DOMAIN\USERNAME.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.GetDisplayName
member.summary: This method returns the users DisplayName, which it reads from Active Directory. It will change the order of the name if it contains a comma.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.GetSessions(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method returns all sessions for the user.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.GetSession(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method returns a session for the user based on the machine name.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.LogoffSessionsByMachineName(SelfServiceSessionReset.Models.CtxSessionsToAction)
member.summary: This method logs off specified sessions. The Delivery Controllers, Port, and an array of sessions to logoff are passed in the body using JSON format.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.DisconnectSessionsByMachineName(SelfServiceSessionReset.Models.CtxSessionsToAction)
member.summary: This method diconnects specified sessions. The Delivery Controllers, Port, and an array of sessions to disconnect are passed in the body using JSON format.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.RestartMachinesByMachineName(SelfServiceSessionReset.Models.CtxSessionsToAction)
member.summary: This method restarts specified machines either gracefully or forcefully depending on the information passed. The Site Name, Delivery Controllers, Port, an array of sessions to restart, and the reset variable are passed in the body using JSON format. If the reset value is False, the machines are gracefully restarted. If the reset value is True, the machines are forcefully restarted. Supported on Windows Desktop machines only.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.CtxSessionController.HideSessionsByMachineName(SelfServiceSessionReset.Models.CtxSessionsToAction)
member.summary: This method hides specified sessions. The Site Name, Delivery Controllers, Port, and an array of sessions to hide are passed in the body using JSON format. Each machine must meet the following criteria, which prevents users from hiding sessions unnecessarily. Registration State must be Unregistered OR Power State must be Unknown, Off or TurningOff OR Maintenance Mode must be On.

member.name: M:SelfServiceSessionReset.Controllers.UserProcessController.TerminateRemoteProcessByID(SelfServiceSessionReset.Models.TerminateProcess)
member.summary: This method terminates processes based on the machine name and pids passed in the body. Passing it in the body allows for multiple processes to be passed in an array without overcomplicating the URI.
